Moving along to matters more important in the world political picture, DOXA

Among Christian Democrats* only eight per cent thought America wished to

Fifteen per cent of the i-iberals and Monarchists believed the statement that

The neo-Fasolets were more nearly in agreement with the Communists and left

"some assert that America Is not interested, enough in Italy, others that
she meddles too much in our affairs. According to you, who is right?"
Thirteen per cent said the United States was not interested enough In Italy;

gave no answer.
